mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, PROFILE_IMG, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL, AUTHORITY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_DEL_FL, ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberTel}, #{memberAddress}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT )
